queries.query:
from(bucket: "Molinos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "turbina")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lv_active_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["turbine_id"] == v.turbine_id)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Molinos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "turbina")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lv_active_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["turbine_id"] == v.turbine_id)
  |> derivative(unit: v.windowPeriod, nonNegative: false)
  |> yield(name: "derivative")

from(bucket: "Molinos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "turbina")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wind_speed" or r["_field"] == "wind_direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["turbine_id"] == v.turbine_id)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Molinos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "turbina")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lv_active_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["turbine_id"] == v.turbine_id)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "Molinos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "turbina")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wind_direction" or r["_field"] == "wind_speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["turbine_id"] == v.turbine_id)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "Molinos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "turbina")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "theoretical_power_curve")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["turbine_id"] == v.turbine_id)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "Molinos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "turbina")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "theoretical_power_curve")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
